name: Glue Tycoon
description:
Welcome to the fantastic world of blocky glue buyers and sellers. Make sure young Frazer Todd manages to get the money he needs for college but he only haave 5 days to make the money.

This was our final school project for the year and we hope that you apreciate what we managed to create for you guys over this last 8 weeks. It's been a hard struggle and at times just wanted to cry in the shower to relieve some stress. 

If you happen to find some bugs or have any other form of feedback, don't be afraid to leave comments.

Have fun!
